name: Flight Rising: Highlight Awakened Familiars V2
description: Adds border around awakened familiars in Flight Rising. Awakened familiars must be manually added to the code from this spreadsheet that the user must fill out in order for the code to work. Updates can be found here.
additional_info:
The color of the box around the familiar picture defaults to purple, but can be changed to another color other than purple if desired. Simply open the code editor and select a new color towards the end of the code.

November 25, 2018: Added the event familiars for the past few months, Thunderhead Savannah familiars, and others!
